lead_paragraph: Israel targeted Hamas bases after militants fired rockets toward Israeli border communities late Friday. Shrapnel from Israeli attack kills 2 children.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

headline.print_headline: Israeli Airstrike in Gaza Kills Two Children, Hamas Official Says
headline.main: After Rockets Fired From Gaza, Israelis Strike Hamas Bases

snippet: Israel targeted Hamas bases after militants fired rockets toward Israeli border communities late Friday. Shrapnel from Israeli attack kills 2 children.
abstract: Israeli airstrikes aimed at Hamas military bases in Gaza Strip kill 10-year-old boy and 6-year-old girl.
